title: G-STAR RAW Men's Airblaze 3D Skinny Fit Jeans
description: Featuring front leg utility pockets and back leg bellow pockets at calf with 3D articulated leg with reinforced knee panels and work wear style back and front pockets
Skinny 3D Fit: Fitted waist, regular rise, knee panels and heel guards, thigh pockets integrated with snap closure at one side with a double flap pocket on the other
Stretchy soft fabric provides ultimate comfort

A hybrid design mixing work wear jeans with a multi-pocket ﬁshing garment. Featuring front leg utility pockets and back leg bellow pockets at calf. 3D articulated leg with reinforced knee panels and work wear style back and front pockets. This skinny pant is a hybrid design where workwear meets fishing utility gear. The multi pockets as we know from fishing pants are translated in to this jeans. Snap closure thigh pockets and double flap pockets are combined with a lower leg pocket at the back side of the leg. Workwear inspired details such as the 3D reinforced knee panels, heel guards and the double layered lower section in the back pockets complete this strong piece.
